title: mail notification of new files
body:
it would be nice to have a notification app, which lets you define some watched directories. all new/updated/delete files should be listed within an e-mail to the users, who can access the files (and are not the owner of the file). the actions should be configurable (new/update/delete). it should be possible to define a template text for the e-mail and a sender address.

i have built such a thing on the filesystem with inotify, but only the administrator of the server can change or enhance the config. it would be helpful to allow the user to config the things for its own files. administrator of the owncloud instance should enable/disable mailing per user.

background:
we use the cloud to exchange files between working groups around the world and it is annoying to look multiple times a day into the cloud for new files. currently we must write an additional mail to all users to specify changed/new files. actually the files are not part of interest, we list the directories, which have new files.
